languages.text: {n}Из-под медной маски раздается гулкий, усиленный эхом болезненный смех.{/n} "Мне известно все".
{n}The hollow, pained laughter from behind the brass mask is amplified by its echo.{/n} "I know everything."
languages.original_text: {n}Из-под медной маски раздается гулкий, усиленный эхом болезненный смех.{/n} "Мне известно все".

traits.locale_text: {n}The hollow, pained laughter from behind the brass mask is made louder by its echo.{/n} "I know everything."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}真ちゅう製マスクの下からもれた、誠意のない苦痛交じりの笑いが反響で増幅される。{/n}「何もかもを知っているとも」
languages.original_text: {n}The hollow, pained laughter from behind the brass mask is amplified by its echo.{/n} "I know everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}真ちゅう製マスクの下からもれた、誠意のない苦痛交じりの笑いが反響で増幅される。{/n}「何もかもを知っているとも」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}空洞而痛苦的笑声从面具下传来，回声让她的声音更加响亮。{/n}“我什么都知道。”
languages.original_text: {n}The hollow, pained laughter from behind the brass mask is amplified by its echo.{/n} "I know everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}空洞而痛苦的笑声从面具下传来，回声让她的声音更加响亮。{/n}“我什么都知道。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}L'écho du rire de Murmecuivre résonne derrière son masque.{/n} « Je sais tout. »
languages.original_text: {n}The hollow, pained laughter from behind the brass mask is amplified by its echo.{/n} "I know everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'écho du rire de Murmecuivre résonne derrière son masque.{/n} « Je sais tout. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}La risa hueca y dolorosa que proviene de detrás de la máscara se amplifica con su eco.{/n} «Lo sé todo».
languages.original_text: {n}The hollow, pained laughter from behind the brass mask is amplified by its echo.{/n} "I know everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}La risa hueca y dolorosa que proviene de detrás de la máscara se amplifica con su eco.{/n} «Lo sé todo».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Das hohle, gequälte Lachen von hinter der Messingmaske wird durch das Echo verstärkt.{/n} "Ich weiß alles."
languages.original_text: {n}The hollow, pained laughter from behind the brass mask is amplified by its echo.{/n} "I know everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das hohle, gequälte Lachen von hinter der Messingmaske wird durch das Echo verstärkt.{/n} "Ich weiß alles."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Pirinç maskenin arkasından yükselen, içi boş ve acılı gülüş; mekânda yankılanıp iyice tesir edici bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Her şeyi biliyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The hollow, pained laughter from behind the brass mask is amplified by its echo.{/n} "I know everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pirinç maskenin arkasından yükselen, içi boş ve acılı gülüş ortamda yankılanıyor ve daha tesir edici bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Ben her şeyi biliyorum."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
